title: Dead Space is Getting a Remake?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.02.21
description:
Blessing and Tim celebrate their birthdays and talk about expectations for a Dead Space remake!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:34 - Housekeeping
We’re off this Monday for 4th of July weekend! So don’t expect any shows to go live or any live recordings to take place on Monday. Instead:
PS I Love You XOXO is recording this afternoon! So get your questions and write-ins in asap. We’re talking about all of the big acquisitions along with all of the big PlayStation news of the last week. And also talking about Chicory: A Colorful Tale. That’ll go live at the regular time on Tuesday next week.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness &Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:08:05 - The next Dead Space is a full remake - Jeff Grubb @ GamesBeat
00:18:19 - Rockstar’s co-founder Dan Houser has founded a new Studio - Chris Scullion @ Video Games Chronicle
00:23:13 - Skyward Sword is getting a bunch of quality of life improvements - Damien McFerran @ Nintendo Life
00:29:50 - Ad
00:31:50 - id Software is shelving Doom Eternal’s Invasion mode and is making Horde mode instead
00:34:50 - There’s a cool new game from Flying Wild Hog!
00:40:10 - Don’t expect Dragon Age or Mass Effect at EA Play this year
00:41:36 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
00:47:50 - Gamer Confessions:I haven't played a single game in the following franchises - Emmett Watkins Jr.
00:57:20 - Squad Up:Mick(XBox) - OG MickLaw
Required reading - https://www.ign.com/articles/why-indie-publishers-fed-up-playstation
01:00:30 - You‘re Wrong
Next week’s Hosts:
MON: We’re off for the 4th of July
TUES: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Bless

Blessing and Tim celebrate their birthdays and talk about expectations for a Dead Space remake!


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:05:34 - Housekeeping

We’re off this Monday for 4th of July weekend! So don’t expect any shows to go live or any live recordings to take place on Monday. Instead:

PS I Love You XOXO is recording this afternoon! So get your questions and write-ins in asap. We’re talking about all of the big acquisitions along with all of the big PlayStation news of the last week. And also talking about Chicory: A Colorful Tale. That’ll go live at the regular time on Tuesday next week.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness &Black Jack
